NAME: Bash
DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to target creature and you gain armor equal to your ATQ.

NAME: Sap
DESCRIPTION: Shuffle target creature into Dungeon deck.

NAME: Lightning Bolt
DESCRIPTION: Deal 4 damage to target creature. Persist.

NAME: Fury
DESCRIPTION: Gain +3 ATQ Until end of your turn. Gain one Action Point.

NAME: Keen Sense
DESCRIPTION: Reveal two cards. Gain two Action Points.

NAME: Brilliance
DESCRIPTION: Gain two maximum Mana.

NAME: Breakthrough
DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to each creature equal to your ATQ.

NAME: Avoid Fate
DESCRIPTION: Destroy target unrevealed card.

NAME: Outwit
DESCRIPTION: Destroy all traps.

NAME: Body Check
DESCRIPTION: Reveal a card$c if it's a creature$c gain one Action Point. Persist.

NAME: Sharpen
DESCRIPTION: Gain +1 ATQ. Persist.

NAME: Stomp
DESCRIPTION: Duplicate. Deal 1 damage to each creature.

NAME: Decimate
DESCRIPTION: Deal 4 damage to four target creatures.

NAME: Defend
DESCRIPTION: Gain 8 Armour.

NAME: Engage
DESCRIPTION: Flash. Gain two Action Points.

NAME: Dismember
DESCRIPTION: Deal 5 damage to target creature. It gets -5 ATQ.

NAME: Frisk
DESCRIPTION: Reveal a card$c if it's a trap$c gain 8 Armour.

NAME: Sixth Sense
DESCRIPTION: Reveal three cards$c Gain three Action Points.

NAME: Bonecrack
DESCRIPTION: Deal X damage to target creature and it gets -X ATQ$c Where X is your ATQ. Persist.

NAME: Illuminate
DESCRIPTION: Reveal four cards.

NAME: Mana Shield
DESCRIPTION: Gain 6 Armour$c gain one Action Point.

NAME: Force of Will
DESCRIPTION: Destroy target trap.

NAME: Electrolyze
DESCRIPTION: Flash$c duplicate. Deal 2 damage to target creature.

NAME: Wildfire
DESCRIPTION: Deal 7 damage to a random creature. Repeat this process.
